name: moroccan-bac-calculator
description: A Moroccan baccalaureate average calculator web app.
author: Mohamed Driou

scripts.version:patch: git pull --tags && npm version patch -m 'Bump version to %s'
scripts.version:minor: git pull --tags && npm version minor -m 'Bump version to %s'
scripts.version:major: git pull --tags && npm version major -m 'Bump version to %s'
scripts.version:custom: echo 'Manually update version in package.json then run git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push --tags'
